about_the_game:
Blue Flame VR take you back in time to October 23, 1970 to Bonneville Salt Flats in Utah where the rocket-powered vehicle Blue Flame driven by Gary Gabelich set a new World Land Speed Record which lasted for more than a decade and became the first car in the history to achieve 1000km/h.

Blue Flame VR offers you the stroll through the authentic scenery of amazing Bonneville Salt Flats, allows you to admire the beautiful exterior of the rocket car and lets you look under the hood. You can sit next to the Gary Gabelich and enjoy the view directly from the cockpit. Thats all in VR with high res textures. For those interested more in this topic, read the story behind the Blue Flame, remind yourself some facts, explore the unique 3D model of the vehicle or have just fun by watching the Movie.

Features:
Modes - Explore, Cinema, Ride

1. Exploration of the Blue Flame car
2. The Blue Flame Story, Facts, Sources
3. Movie: Break The Record by Dick Keller
4. Aim Ground Teleport
5. Removing Parts
6. Parts Labels
7. Mini Model
8. Cutaway
9. Toggle Layers
10. Audio Toggle
11. Help Toggle
12. Music Track
13. Precise 3D Model in Scale
14. Driving experience
detailed_description:
Blue Flame VR

This app is dedicated to all who have the power to design their own dreams and live them. Celebrate the 50th anniversary of this memorable event.


About the Software

Blue Flame VR take you back in time to October 23, 1970 to Bonneville Salt Flats in Utah where the rocket-powered vehicle Blue Flame driven by Gary Gabelich set a new World Land Speed Record which lasted for more than a decade and became the first car in the history to achieve 1000km/h. Blue Flame VR offers you the stroll through the authentic scenery of amazing Bonneville Salt Flats, allows you to admire the beautiful exterior of the rocket car and lets you look under the hood. You can sit next to the Gary Gabelich and enjoy the view directly from the cockpit. Thats all in VR with high res textures. For those interested more in this topic, read the story behind the Blue Flame, remind yourself some facts, explore the unique 3D model of the vehicle or have just fun by watching the Movie. Features: Modes - Explore, Cinema, Ride 1. Exploration of the Blue Flame car 2. The Blue Flame Story, Facts, Sources 3. Movie: Break The Record by Dick Keller 4. Aim Ground Teleport 5. Removing Parts 6. Parts Labels 7. Mini Model 8. Cutaway 9. Toggle Layers 10. Audio Toggle 11. Help Toggle 12. Music Track 13. Precise 3D Model in Scale 14. Driving experience

subs.option_description: $4.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $4.99 USD.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: W7, W8.1, W10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: HTC VIVE Headset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: W7, W8.1, W10
  • Processor: i5, i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 980, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HTC VIVE Headset
